contentrichtext.text: {{coord|40|02|19|N|116|18|36|E|type:railwaystation|display=title}} [[Image:20060416104005 - 清河站.gif|right|240px|thumbnail|Qinghe railway station (click for bigger version)]] '''Qinghe railway station''' ({{zh|c=清河站|p=Qīnghé Zhàn}}) is a railway station in [[Beijing]]. == Schedules == There are 5 passenger trains stop at the station everyday: {| class="wikitable" ! Train No. !! Arrive !! Depart !! Stops !! |- | Y575 || 13:28 || 13:29 || 1 min || [[Beijing North Railway Station|Beijing north]] – [[Yanqing railway station|Yanqing]] |- | 4449 || 17:15 || 17:23 || 8 min || [[Beijing North Railway Station|Beijing north]] – [[Longhua railway station|Longhua]] |- | 4450 || 14:38 || 14:39|| 1 min || [[Longhua railway station|Longhua]] – [[Beijing North Railway Station|Beijing north]] |- | 6453 || 06:31 || 06:38 || 7 min || [[Beijing North Railway Station|Beijing north]] – [[Luanping railway station|Luanping]] |- | 6454 || 20:58 || 21:16 || 18 min || [[Luanping railway station|Luanping]] – [[Beijing North Railway Station|Beijing north]] |} '''Note: ''' Updated in Sep. 2010. == See also == * [[Qinghe]] {{s-rail-start}} {{s-rail|title=CR}} {{s-line|system=CR|line=Jingbao|branch=[[Jingzhang Railway]]|previous=Qinghuayuan|next=Shahe|}} {{s-rail-next|title=BJS}} {{s-line|system=BJS|line=S2|previous=Qinghuayuan|next=Shahe}} {{end}} {{Beijing Subway Station|lineS2=yes}} [[Category:Railway stations in Beijing]] {{Beijing-railstation-stub}}
